snippet: This concert, the first in the season’s Pop-Up series at Miller Theater in Manhattan, included the trombonist Steven Parker’s rendition of Berio’s “Sequenza V.”
lead_paragraph: This concert, the first in the season’s Pop-Up series at Miller Theater in Manhattan, included the trombonist Steven Parker’s rendition of Berio’s “Sequenza V.”

headline.main: Review: Ensemble Signal’s Musicians Do Solo Turns in ‘Theatricals’
